'''v0.11.0 alpha build 10''' is the tenth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]].

== Additions ==
=== Skin packs ===
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[City Folk Skin Pack]].
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[Town Folk Skin Pack]].

== Changes ==
* [[Third person]] interactions are only available in front of the [[player]].
* Increased [[creative mode]] interaction range.

== Fixes ==
'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15322 13 bugs fixed]'''

* Clients connecting to the server would [[Teleportation|teleport]] the host when spawning.
* Hotbar won’t shift to the left anymore.
* Players are affected by knockback on servers.
* Players can be pulled by a [[fishing rod]].
* Chat, PotionEffect, and Similar buttons will only open when tapping (not dragging).
* Increased amount of [[gravel]] on Extreme Hills Mutated [[biome]].
* [[World]] opening errors are now logged (for future fixes).

'''From the 0.11.0 development versions'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8215}} - [[Sand|Sand block]] disappearing when falling (worlds before 0.11 only).
* {{bug|MCPE-8285}} - All [[leaves]] are not named correctly.
* {{bug|MCPE-8305}} - Game crash when breaking [[Nether Reactor Core]].

'''From the previous development version'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8399}} - [[Eating]] [[food]] gives incorrect [[particle]]s.
* {{bug|MCPE-8429}} - [[Stone Brick]] bug.
* {{bug|MCPE-8436}} - [[Farming]] [[wheat]], [[potato]]es and [[carrot]]s doesn't work.</onlyinclude>
